summary: This is an email chain from September 2020 between an Assistant United States Attorney from the SDNY and defense attorney Marc Weinstein. The AUSA provides information about a 2009 deposition in a case involving Jeffrey Epstein, identifying the plaintiff's attorney and Epstein's legal representation at that time.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Defense Attorney, Partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: He is the recipient of the email and is being asked to help locate a deposition transcript from 2009. He is a white-collar defense partner.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Identified as the attorney representing the plaintiff in the 2009 deposition involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the 2009 deposition. He was represented by Mark Luttier and Bob Critton.

persons.name: Mark Luttier
persons.context: Along with Bob Critton, represented Jeffrey Epstein in the 2009 deposition.

persons.name: Bob Critton
persons.context: Partner at Critton, Luttier, and Coleman LLP who, with Mark Luttier, represented Jeffrey Epstein in the 2009 deposition.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Copied on the email chain, suggesting involvement in the SDNY investigation discussion.

connections.description: Mark Luttier, along with Bob Critton, represented Jeffrey Epstein in a 2009 deposition.
Bob Critton, along with Mark Luttier, represented Jeffrey Epstein in a 2009 deposition.
Both were partners at Critton, Luttier, and Coleman LLP and jointly represented Jeffrey Epstein.
Both are copied on the same email chain regarding the SDNY investigation and transcript request.

events.title: Deposition of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A deposition took place involving Jeffrey Epstein. He was represented by Mark Luttier and Bob Critton. The plaintiff was represented by Jack Scarola.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding 2009 Transcript
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails Marc Weinstein to provide details about a 2009 deposition transcript they are seeking, identifying the involved attorneys.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2020 email where an SDNY AUSA is seeking a deposition transcript from 2009 involving Jeffrey Epstein.
In the 2009 deposition, Jeffrey Epstein was represented by attorneys Mark Luttier and Bob Critton of Critton, Luttier, and Coleman LLP in West Palm Beach.
The plaintiff in the 2009 case was represented by attorney Jack Scarola.
The email correspondence involves defense attorney Marc A. Weinstein of Hughes Hubbard & Reed, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity related to Epstein in 2020.
The primary sender's name (the AUSA) is redacted in the provided text.
